Article.ArticleTitle: Biological Potential and Medical Use of Secondary Metabolites.

AbstractText: This Medicines special issue focuses on the great potential of secondary metabolites for therapeutic applications. The special issue contains 16 articles reporting relevant experimental results and overviews of bioactive secondary metabolites. Their biological effects and new methodologies that improve the lead compounds' synthesis were also discussed. We would like to thank all 83 authors, from all over the world, for their valuable contributions to this special issue.
